level.heading: Assertion of adverse claim against entitlement holder.
level.text: An action based on an adverse claim to a financial asset, whether framed in conversion, replevin, constructive trust, equitable lien, or other theory, may not be asserted against a person who acquires a security entitlement under § 28:8-501 for value and without notice of the adverse claim.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-240
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-240, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 28:8-501.
